mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc
select no, title, contents, g_no as groupNo, o_no as groupOrNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }
select o_no from board where no = #{no}
select g_no from board where no = #{no}

select a.no, title, contents, hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{start}, 5
